name: Take This
description:
Take This is a game about surviving together. You share a a connection through a life link and if it's severed you will end up dying. Trying to stay too close is also dangerous.

Also, since it's dangerous to go alone, you took a sword with you. Unfortunately you indeed only took one sword. It's a magical one that finds it's way back to you, but you need to share.

There's no end goal, but you can always try to reach for better high score (which are only saved in your memories).

Developed as an entry to Extra Credits Game Jam #4
